title: Overturning the World - Novel Updates
tags: Death of Loved Ones   Loneliness   Long Separations   Marriage of Convenience   Royalty   Short Story   Unconditional Love
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description: After the Princess of Qi, Qing Shi died, there was a man who hadn’t truly lived since. That man gave up his entire life as a sacrifice for her death. No matter how relentless time can be, it will never wash away the memories of happiness, instead it will ingrain the painful memories much deeper still.>
